transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Good afternoon sir.
Customer: Good afternoon.
Executive: Haan ji sir Shubham bol raha tha IndiaMART se head office se sir.
Customer: Haan ji boliye.
Executive: Ji sir aap bhi customer care pe call kar rahe the to
Customer: Ji sir.
Customer: Call kar raha tha customer care pe call.
Executive: Ji ji bataiye sir.
Customer: Yaar mujhe aapne time pe call nahi uthate time pe.
Executive: Sorry sir aawaz kat rahi hai aapki kya keh rahe hain?
Customer: Main kaha manager call to uthate nahi hai time pe jo aapne manager assign kiya hua hai.
Executive: Aapko sir abhi to dekhiye sir aapko Anjali assign hongi sir aaj theek hai Anjali aapke abhi to mere paas hi hai aapka account theek hai sir Anjali Anjali hai jo aapko assign hongi servicing ka kaam karenge pura proper sir aapka.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: To aapko koi issue aapko.
Customer: Shiva ko.
Executive: Shiva ko de do account na Shiva.
Executive: Sir wo mere sir mere haath mein nahi hai sir wo data dekhiye location wise divide hota hai aapko koi concern hai to mujhe bataiye sir.
Customer: Nahi abhi filhal to meri profile mein matlab problem aa rahi hai ek to isko set karwani hai dusri baat ye hai ki main dusra koi plan kar raha hu na package ka.
Executive: To sir wo hamari bhi hamara bhi aapse kai baar discussion hua hai services ke liye Dolly se aapki baat hui hai mere se bhi baat hui hai maximizer ke liye kai baar baat ho chuki hai already aapse theek hai sir.
Customer: Maximizer bhi le lenge par problem ye hai ki pehle sabhi set karna padega abhi do char din ruko.
Executive: Haan to sir wo jo koi dikkat nahi sir aap jitna time lenge wo kara denge isme jaruri nahi Shiva ke paas hi jaaye usme kyunki hum bhi hamara aisa nahi hai meri aapse koi pehli baar baat ho rahi hai Aman se aapko yaad hoga Aman executive tha jo aapka usse regular baat hoti thi aapki na sir.
Executive: Sir aur mere sath aapki mere sath aapki kai baar September mein video meet wagera bhi hui thi aapko yaad hoga to video meet mein baith ke sara samjhaya tha maine to samjhaya tha sara pura proper tarike se maximizer ka aapko aur agar aapko koi doubt rahega to hum fir se ek baar connect kare jo bhi discuss kar lenge aap aap samjh rahe hain sir usme koi issue nahi hai usme kyunki service jo dega wo IndiaMART se executive dega chahe main du chahe koi aur de sir aapko theek hai sir ultimately ultimately services IndiaMART ki hi run karni hai sir wo kisi ki personal services to hai nahi sir theek hai na theek hai to aap mujhe bataiye kab connect haan sir bataiye sorry sir kya keh rahe hain?
Customer: Haan? Kya kuch keh rahe hain sir?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji bas yahi hai sir.
Executive: Hmm hmm nahi to aap mujhe bataiye sir main aap bataiye main kab connect karu fir sir aapse is cheez ke liye sir matlab aap kya kya isme kara changes kya karana cha rahe hain starting mein abhi?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Aapko changes wagera bhi karana cha rahe hain sir isme kya?
Customer: Nahi nahi koi changes nahi karana cha raha.
Customer: Abhi aap mere product fix kar do.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai main kar de raha hu sir main ek baar karke na aapse main thodi der mein check karke na phone phone call bhi kar sakta hu.
Customer: Meri profile se thoda na ye keyword wagera acche se kar do main abhi do ek do teen tak 9696 wale number pe whatsapp karunga aap isse keyword wagera lagwa dena acche se.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai theek hai theek hai theek hai main aur ye jo complaint aaya use to close kar du na main aapne number se message kar de raha hu aapko whatsapp kar de raha hu theek hai sir kyunki customer care pe call ticket open ho complaint open ho gaya main aapko apne number se message kar de raha hu jo bhi rahega hum discuss kar lenge usi pe theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay sir?
Customer: Okay ji.
Executive: Theek hai haan baki message kar de raha hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants manager to pick up calls on time.

- Profile needs fixing and keyword updates.

- Planning to upgrade the package.



Resolution:

- Assured Anjali will be assigned for servicing.

- Executive offered to fix profile and keywords.

- Agreed to discuss Maximizer plan later.

- Will message the customer from personal number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will fix the profile.

- Customer will WhatsApp on 9696 number.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- profile, keywords, maximizer, servicing
